origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: International Union of United Brewery, Flour, Cereal, Soft Drink and Distillery Workers of America. Local 266 (Leechburg, Pa.)

did.abstract: International Union of United Brewery, Flour, Cereal, Soft Drink and Distillery Workers of America Local 266 represented workers in Leechburg, Pa. This collection contains contract negotiation and meeting minutes of Local 266.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: United Brewery Workers Pennsylvania Council Records, 1938-1983, AIS.1984.12, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh
United Brewery Workers, Local 267 Records, 1936-1959, AIS.1984.11, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: International Union of United Brewery, Flour, Cereal, Soft Drink and Distillery Workers of America Local 266 represented workers in Leechburg, Pa. The union began as United Distillery Workers of North America Local 3 before it changed to United Distillery Workers Local Industrial Union No. 3 and Distillery Workers Local 266 before finally settling on this name. The union represented workers at Joseph S. Finch & Company in Logansport, Pennsylvania, for a time, but mostly consisted of employees at Schenley Distillery, which closed in 1984.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: United Brewery Workers, Local 266 Records, 1947-1979, AIS.1984.10, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: United Brewery Workers, Local 266 Records, 1947-1979, AIS.1984.10, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was processed by Archives Service Center staff.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: This collection contains contract negotiation and meeting minutes of Local 266. Also included are correspondence, employment records, and notices from the company to workers.
